access: Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Boots of Free Running](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2456)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These comfortable and practical boots slip on easily and fill you with boundless energy. The treads of these boots provide exceptional traction, with improved grip on surfaces you would traditionally have difficulty traversing. While wearing the boots, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) and to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) and [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37).

<document level="2" id="action-2011" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Free Running (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 135 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Free Running (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 1,350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2. You can activate the _moderate boots of free running_ once per hour instead of once per day.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Boots of Free Running (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 13,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3. You can activate the _greater boots of free running_ without a frequency limit.
name: Boots of Free Running (Moderate)
